Package org.ros.android.view.visualization.shape

Interface Summary
Shape A Shape is a OpenGlDrawable that has a Color and a Transform that is applied to the OpenGL matrix stack before drawing.
 

Class Summary
Color Defines a color based on RGBA values in the range [0, 1].
GoalShape Represents the robot's current goal pose.
PoseShape Represents the pose that will be published.
RobotShape Represents the robot.
TriangleFanShape A Shape defined by vertices using OpenGl's GL_TRIANGLE_FAN method.
